name: novibesonlyencryptions ;)
description: Deploy SS with prefered encryption method.

ENCRYPT.description: Encryption method, default: chacha20-ietf-poly1305, others are aes-256-cfb, rc4-md5, salsa20, chacha20-ietf etc.

PASSWORD.description: The password of shadowsocks ;) you should change this

VER.description: v2ray-plugin version, the latest version is installed by default, you can select the version different version if you want.

V2_Path.description: Path path, default /connect, you can also replace connect with something else for safety, / cannot be less.

AppName.description: Please copy-paste the App Name filled at the top to generate the configuration and QR code. If you don’t want to generate it, type no

QR_Path.description: QR code and configuration link path, the default qr, you can also change it, but it cannot be the same as V2_Path. If the AppName variable is no, this variable has no effect

ProxySite.description: Replacing a website, for example: www.ietf.org, if you don’t fill in it means to use a local static webpage file.
